svg.desc: Created with Fabric.js 3.6.3 from http://svgeditoronline.com/ then edited by hand

polygon.style: stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 20; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 20; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

stroke: rgb(255,255,255); stroke-width: 10; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(255,255,255); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
